## `ShowSidebar` {#batch-showsidebar}

Show or hides the project's sidebar\index{user interface!sidebar}.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
ShowSidebar(boolean show)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `boolean` show | `true` to show the sidebar, `false` to hide it. |
:::
